summary.span: 代表一組 SQL 命令和一個資料庫連接，用來填入 並更新資料來源。

span.span: Represents a set of SQL commands and a database connection that are used to fill the and update the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當做之間的橋樑以及用來擷取並儲存資料的資料來源。The serves as a bridge between a and a data source for retrieving and saving data. 對應提供這個橋接器中的資料的變更以符合資料來源中的資料和，變更要比對中的資料的資料來源中的資料。The provides this bridge by mapping , which changes the data in the to match the data in the data source, and , which changes the data in the data source to match the data in the . 如果您要連接到 SQL Server 資料庫，您可以藉由提高整體效能以及與其相關聯和物件。If you are connecting to a SQL Server database, you can increase overall performance by using the along with its associated and objects. OLE DB 支援的資料來源，請使用具有與其相關聯和物件。For OLE DB-supported data sources, use the with its associated and objects. ODBC 支援的資料來源，請使用具有與其相關聯和物件。For ODBC-supported data sources, use the with its associated and objects. Oracle 資料庫，請使用具有與其相關聯和物件。For Oracle databases, use the with its associated and objects. 執行個體時建立時，讀取/寫入屬性會設為初始值。When an instance of is created, the read/write properties are set to initial values. 如需這些值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of these values, see the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個多載建構函式適用於.NET Framework 資料提供者實作 clone 實作中使用類似的建構函式時。This overload of the constructor is designed for use by a .NET Framework data provider when implementing a similar constructor for use in a clone implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呼叫`Update`方法`DataAdapter`，資料庫可以傳送資料回 ADO.NET 應用程式做為輸出參數或做為第一個傳回結果集的記錄。During a call to the `Update` method of a `DataAdapter`, the database can send data back to your ADO.NET application as output parameters or as the first returned record of a result set. ADO.NET 可以擷取這些值並在正在更新的 中更新對應的資料行。ADO.NET can retrieve these values and update the corresponding columns in the being updated. 根據預設，ADO.NET 呼叫`AcceptChanges`方法`DataRow`更新之後。By default, ADO.NET calls the `AcceptChanges` method of the `DataRow` after the update. 不過，如果您想要合併更新的資料列放回另一個，您可能想要保留主要索引鍵資料行的原始值。However, if you want to merge the updated row back into another , you may want to preserver the original value of a primary key column. 例如，主索引鍵資料行對應至資料庫，例如識別資料行中的自動遞增資料行可以包含新值指派資料庫的不符合中指派的原始值`DataRow`。For example, a primary key column corresponding to an automatically incrementing column in the database, such as an identity column, can contain new values that are assigned by the database that do not match the original values assigned in the `DataRow`. 根據預設，`AcceptChanges`之後更新和原始值的資料列可能已在隱含地呼叫ADO.NET 中，所指派的值會遺失。By default, `AcceptChanges` is called implicitly after an update, and the original values in the row, which may have been values assigned by ADO.NET, are lost. 您可以保留中的原始值`DataRow`藉由防止`ADO.NET`呼叫`AcceptChanges`它藉由設定執行資料列更新之後屬性`false`，保留原始值。You can preserve the original values in the `DataRow` by preventing `ADO.NET` from calling `AcceptChanges` after it performs an update on a row, by setting the property to `false`, which preserves the original values. > [!NOTE] > 設定`AcceptChangesDuringUpdate`屬性`false`適用於所有資料修改，不只會插入。Setting the `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` property to `false` applies to all data modifications, not only inserts. 如果您想要編輯或刪除資料列，在相同的更新中，而且您想要隱藏呼叫`AcceptChanges`只會針對插入，則不會設定`AccceptChangesDuringUpdate`至`false`，使用的事件處理常式`RowUpdated`事件`DataAdapter`。If you want to edit or delete rows in the same update, and if you want to suppress the call to `AcceptChanges` only for inserts, then instead of setting `AccceptChangesDuringUpdate` to `false`, use an event handler for the `RowUpdated` event of the `DataAdapter`. 在事件處理常式可以檢查可判斷資料的修改是插入、 以及如果`true`，將屬性至。In the event handler you can check the to determine if the data modification is an insert, and if `true`, set the property of the to . 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[擷取識別或自動編號值](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-identity-or-autonumber-values.md)。For more information and an example, see [Retrieving Identity or Autonumber Values](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-identity-or-autonumber-values.md). ## Examples 這則範例會示範如何從 `DataTable` 中擷取已變更的資料列，以及使用 來更新資料來源並擷取新的識別資料行值。This example demonstrates extracting changed rows from a `DataTable` and using a to update the data source and retrieve a new identity column value. 藉由設定`AcceptChangesDuringUpdate`屬性至`false`保留原始的自動遞增值，新的資料可以合併至原始，即使新的識別值不符合原始自動遞增中的值`DataTable`。By setting the `AcceptChangesDuringUpdate` property of the to `false` to preserve the original auto increment value, the new data can then be merged into the original , even if the new identity value does not match the original auto increment value in the `DataTable`. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlClient.AcceptChangesDuringUpdate/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立 的這個執行個體的複本。

span.span: Creates a copy of this instance of .
The cloned instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法已被取代。This method is deprecated. 應該使用建構函式，而不是此方法。The constructor should be used instead of this method. 所有命令， 、 ，而就會遭到複製。All the commands, the , the , and the are cloned. 不過，命令的連接不會複製，而共用。However, the connections for the commands are not copied, but shared. 因此，複製可針對與原始連線相同。Thus, the cloned can be used against the same connection as the original.

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ContinueUpdateOnError { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，指定當資料列更新期間發生錯誤時，是否產生例外狀況。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to generate an exception when an error is encountered during a row update.

value.span: 若要繼續更新而不產生例外狀況，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to continue the update without generating an exception; otherwise .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ContinueUpdateOnError`設`true`，一個資料列更新期間發生錯誤時，會擲回任何例外狀況。If `ContinueUpdateOnError` is set to `true`, no exception is thrown when an error occurs during the update of a row. 已略過資料列的更新，而錯誤資訊放在錯誤中的資料列的屬性。The update of the row is skipped and the error information is placed in the property of the row in error. 繼續更新後續資料列。The continues to update subsequent rows. 如果`ContinueUpdateOnError`設`false`，一個資料列更新期間發生錯誤時，會擲回例外狀況。If `ContinueUpdateOnError` is set to `false`, an exception is thrown when an error occurs during the update of a row.

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用方法和方法。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫，請小心不要參考到已處置的早期呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

returns.span: 成功加入至 或在其中重新整理的資料列數目。

span.span: This does not include rows affected by statements that do not return rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會從使用 SELECT 陳述式指定由相關聯的資料來源擷取資料列屬性。The method retrieves rows from the data source using the SELECT statement specified by an associated property. SELECT 陳述式相關聯的連接物件必須有效，但它不需要開啟。The connection object associated with the SELECT statement must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果連接已關閉之前是呼叫，它會開啟擷取資料，然後關閉。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed. 如果連接為開啟之前是呼叫，它會保持開啟狀態。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 作業接著會將資料列加入到目的地中的物件、 建立如果它們尚不存在的物件。The operation then adds the rows to destination objects in the , creating the objects if they do not already exist. 建立時物件作業通常會建立只有資料行名稱中繼資料。When creating objects, the operation normally creates only column name metadata. 不過，如果屬性設定為`AddWithKey`，也會建立適當的主索引鍵和條件約束。However, if the property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created. 如果 `SelectCommand` 傳回 OUTER JOIN 的結果，則 `DataAdapter` 便不會為產生的 設定 值。If the `SelectCommand` returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a value for the resulting . 您必須明確定義主索引鍵，以確保正確解析重複的資料列。You must explicitly define the primary key to ensure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[定義主索引鍵](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md). 如果資料配接器遇到重複的資料行在填入，它會產生後續的資料行，並使用模式 」 columnname1"、"columnname2"、"columnname3 」 和等等的名稱。If the data adapter encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on. 如果內送資料中包含未命名資料行，它們會放置於根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，等等。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 當多個結果集加入至放置於個別的資料表中每個結果集。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 其他結果集的命名方式是附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"等等） 的整數值。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用資料行和資料表名稱的應用程式應確保這些命名模式衝突不會發生。Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. 當 SELECT 陳述式用來填入傳回多個結果，例如批次 SQL 陳述式中，如果其中一個結果包含錯誤，所有後續的結果會略過且未新增到。When the SELECT statement used to populate the returns multiple results, such as a batch SQL statements, if one of the results contains an error, all subsequent results are skipped and not added to the . 您可以使用上多次相同的方法。You can use the method multiple times on the same . 如果主索引鍵存在，內送資料列會合併具有相符的資料列已經存在。If a primary key exists, incoming rows are merged with matching rows that already exist. 如果沒有主索引鍵存在，將內送資料列附加至。If no primary key exists, incoming rows are appended to the . > [!NOTE] > 處理批次傳回多個結果，實作的 SQL 陳述式時的.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 擷取，只有第一個結果的結構描述資訊。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result. 若要擷取多個結果的結構描述資訊，請使用與設`AddWithKey`。To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use with the set to `AddWithKey`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event FillError As FillErrorEventHandler

summary.span: 當填入作業期間發生錯誤時傳回。

span.span: Returned when an error occurs during a fill operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **FillError**事件可讓使用者決定是否填滿作業應該繼續之後就會發生錯誤。The **FillError** event allows a user to determine whether or not the fill operation should continue after the error occurs. 範例**FillError**事件可能是：Examples of when the **FillError** event might occur are: - 要加入的資料`DataSet`無法轉換成 common language runtime 類型，而不會遺失有效位數。The data being added to a `DataSet` cannot be converted to a common language runtime type without losing precision. - 要加入的資料列包含違反條件約束必須強制執行上的資料`DataColumn`中`DataSet`。The row being added contains data that violates a Constraint that must be enforced on a `DataColumn` in the `DataSet`.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Data.DataTable[] FillSchema (System.Data.DataSet dataSet, System.Data.SchemaType schemaType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable[] FillSchema(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet, valuetype System.Data.SchemaType schemaType) cil managed
public: virtual cli::array <System::Data::DataTable ^> ^ FillSchema(System::Data::DataSet ^ dataSet, System::Data::SchemaType schemaType);

param.name: dataSet
param.span: ，以資料來源中的結構描述來填入其中。

span.span: The to be filled with the schema from the data source.
One of the values.

summary.span: 將 加入至指定的 ，並且根據指定的 設定結構描述，以符合資料來源中的資料表。

span.span: Adds a to the specified and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified .

returns.span: 物件，包含從資料來源傳回的結構描述資訊。

span.span: A object that contains schema information returned from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會擷取從資料來源使用的結構描述。The method retrieves the schema from the data source using the . 連接物件相關聯必須有效，但它不需要開啟。The connection object associated with the must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果連接已關閉之前是呼叫，它會開啟擷取資料並關閉。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data and then closed. 如果連接為開啟之前是呼叫，它會保持開啟狀態。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. A作業會將目的地。A operation adds a to the destination . 接著它會加入至資料行的，並設定下列如果存在於資料來源的屬性：It then adds columns to the of the , and configures the following properties if they exist at the data source: - - 。. 您必須設定和分開。You must set and separately. - - - 也會設定和屬性根據下列規則： also configures the and properties according to the following rules: - 如果一或多個主索引鍵資料行所傳回，它們會做為主要索引鍵資料行。If one or more primary key columns are returned by the , they are used as the primary key columns for the . - 如果傳回沒有主索引鍵資料行，但是唯一的資料行，唯一的資料行可用的主索引鍵，如果且只有唯一的資料行都不可為 null。If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if, and only if, all the unique columns are nonnullable. 如果任何資料行可為 null，加入至，但屬性未設定。If any of the columns are nullable, a is added to the , but the property is not set. - 如果傳回主要索引鍵資料行，唯一的資料行，將主索引鍵資料行做為主要索引鍵資料行。If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the . > [!NOTE] > 基礎資料存放區可能會允許不支援的資料行屬性，因而導致不正確轉譯的某些資料行屬性。The underlying data store may allow column attributes that are not supported in a , which causes some column attributes to not translate correctly. 例如，SQL Server 可讓識別資料行資料類型為 tinyint 而只允許 Int16、 Int32、 以及具有 Int64屬性集。For example, SQL Server allows an identity column with a data type of tinyint whereas a only allows Int16, Int32, and Int64 to have the property set. `FillSchema` 以無訊息方式略過的情況下其中無法精確地反映資料來源，並擲回任何例外狀況。`FillSchema` silently ignores cases where the cannot accurately mirror the data source and throws no exception. 請注意，會將主索引鍵和唯一條件約束加入至根據前述規則，但其他條件約束類型不會加入。Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the according to the preceding rules, but other constraint types are not added. 如果唯一叢集索引上的資料行或 SQL Server 資料表中的資料行定義和叢集索引中的資料行的名稱將會傳回一組個別的資料行上定義主索引鍵條件約束。If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned. 若要傳回的主索引鍵資料行的名稱，使用指定名稱的主索引鍵的 SELECT 陳述式中的查詢提示。To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index. 如需有關指定查詢提示的詳細資訊，請參閱[查詢提示 (TRANSACT-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/queries/hints-transact-sql-query)。For more information about specifying query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](/sql/t-sql/queries/hints-transact-sql-query). 如果遇到重複的資料行在填入，它會產生後續的資料行，並使用模式的名稱"*columnname*1"，"*columnname*2"，"*columnname*3"等等。If the encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the subsequent columns, using the pattern "*columnname*1", "*columnname*2", "*columnname*3", and so on. 如果內送資料中包含未命名資料行，它們會放置於根據模式"Column1"、"Column2"，等等。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are placed in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 當多個結果集加入至放置於個別的資料表中每個結果集。When multiple result sets are added to the each result set is placed in a separate table. 其他結果集的命名方式是附加至指定的資料表名稱 （例如，"Table"、"Table1"、"Table2"等等） 的整數值。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用資料行和資料表名稱的應用程式應確保這些命名模式衝突不會發生。Applications using column and table names should ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns does not occur. 不會傳回任何資料列。 does not return any rows. 使用方法，以將資料列加入。Use the method to add rows to a . > [!NOTE] > 處理批次傳回多個結果，實作的 SQL 陳述式時的.NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB 擷取，只有第一個結果的結構描述資訊。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of for the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB retrieves schema information for only the first result. 若要擷取多個結果的結構描述資訊，請使用與設`AddWithKey`。To retrieve schema information for multiple results, use with the set to `AddWithKey`.

[!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataAdapter.TableMappings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Update(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet) cil managed

span.span: The used to update the data source.

summary.span: 從名為 "Table" 之 的指定 中，為每個插入、更新或刪除的資料列分別呼叫 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式。

span.span: Calls the respective INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements for each inserted, updated, or deleted row in the specified from a named "Table."

returns.span: 自 中成功更新的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows successfully updated from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行更新時，為基礎的資料列。The update is performed on a by-row basis. 每個插入、 修改和刪除資料列，方法會判斷已在其上執行變更的類型 （插入、 更新或刪除）。For every inserted, modified, and deleted row, the method determines the type of change that has been performed on it (Insert, Update or Delete). 根據變更的類型`Insert`，`Update,`或`Delete`傳播修改過的資料列至資料來源執行命令範本。Depending on the type of change, the `Insert`, `Update,` or `Delete` command template executes to propagate the modified row to the data source. 當應用程式呼叫方法，檢查屬性，並執行必要的 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式，反覆地針對每個資料列，並根據中設定的索引順序.When an application calls the method, the examines the property, and executes the required INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements iteratively for each row, based on the order of the indexes configured in the . 例如，可能會執行 DELETE 陳述式，後面接著 INSERT 陳述式，則另一個的 DELETE 陳述式，所以中的資料列的排序。For example, might execute a DELETE statement, followed by an INSERT statement, and then another DELETE statement, due to the ordering of the rows in the . 請注意這些陳述式不會執行以批次的處理程序。個別更新每個資料列。It should be noted that these statements are not performed as a batch process; each row is updated individually. 應用程式可以呼叫情況下，您必須在其中控制陳述式型別序列中的方法 （例如，更新之前插入）。An application can call the method in situations where you must control the sequence of statement types (for example, INSERT before UPDATE). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[以 Dataadapter 更新資料來源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information, see [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md). 如果尚未指定 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式，方法會產生例外狀況。If INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements have not been specified, the method generates an exception. 不過，您可以建立或物件來自動產生的單一資料表更新 SQL 陳述式，如果您設定`SelectCommand`.NET Framework 資料提供者的屬性。However, you can create a or object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然後，您未設定任何其他 SQL 陳述式由產生**CommandBuilder**。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the **CommandBuilder**. 此產生邏輯需要索引鍵資料行資訊會出現在。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Commandbuilder 產生命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 方法會從執行更新前的第一個對應中所列的資料表擷取資料列。The method retrieves rows from the table listed in the first mapping before performing an update. 然後重新整理使用的值的資料列屬性。The then refreshes the row using the value of the property. 傳回的任何其他資料列都會被忽略。Any additional rows returned are ignored. 任何資料會載入回後、引發事件，讓使用者檢查調解資料列和任何輸出命令所傳回的參數。After any data is loaded back into the , the event is raised, allowing the user to inspect the reconciled row and any output parameters returned by the command. 已成功更新資料列之後，會接受該資料列所做的變更。After a row updates successfully, the changes to that row are accepted. 當使用，執行的順序如下所示：When using , the order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值移到參數值。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 3. 執行命令。The command executes. 4. 如果命令設定為`FirstReturnedRecord`，則第一個傳回的結果放在。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, then the first returned result is placed in the . 5. 如果沒有輸出參數，它們會放置於。If there are output parameters, they are placed in the . 6. 便會引發 事件。The event is raised. 7. 呼叫 。 is called. 這會引發兩和更新事件。This will raise both the and events for the updated . 每個相關聯的命令通常會有與它關聯的參數集合。Each command associated with the usually has a parameters collection associated with it. 參數對應到目前的資料列，透過`SourceColumn`和`SourceVersion`的.NET 資料提供者的屬性`Parameter`類別。Parameters are mapped to the current row through the `SourceColumn` and `SourceVersion` properties of a .NET data provider's `Parameter` class. `SourceColumn` 是指資料行，以取得目前資料列的參數值的參考。`SourceColumn` refers to a column that the references to obtain parameter values for the current row. `SourceColumn` 在套用任何資料表對應之前，是指未對應的資料行名稱。`SourceColumn` refers to the unmapped column name before any table mappings have been applied. 如果`SourceColumn`參考到不存在的資料行中，所採取的動作取決於下列其中一種值。If `SourceColumn` refers to a nonexistent column, the action taken depends on one of the following values. |列舉值Enumeration value|採取的動作Action taken| |-----------------------|------------------| |`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`|使用中的資料表名稱與來源資料行名稱如果不不存在任何對應。Use the source column names and table names in the if no mapping is present.| |`MissingMappingAction.Ignore`|A產生。A is generated. 對應已明確設定，當遺漏對應的輸入參數通常是錯誤的結果。When the mappings are explicitly set, a missing mapping for an input parameter is usually the result of an error.| |`MissingMappingAction.Error`|A產生。A is generated.| `SourceColumn`屬性也用來對應輸出的值，或輸入/輸出參數回`DataSet`。The `SourceColumn` property is also used to map the value for output or input/output parameters back to the `DataSet`. 如果它是指不存在的資料行，會產生例外狀況。An exception is generated if it refers to a nonexistent column. `SourceVersion` .NET 資料提供者的屬性`Parameter`類別會決定是否要使用的資料行值的原始、 Current 或 Proposed 版本。The `SourceVersion` property of a .NET data provider's `Parameter` class determines whether to use the Original, Current, or Proposed version of the column value. 這項功能通常用於在 UPDATE 陳述式來檢查有開放式同步存取違規的 WHERE 子句中包含原始值。This capability is often used to include original values in the WHERE clause of an UPDATE statement to check for optimistic concurrency violations. 呼叫方法或方法將會認可中的所有變更或。Calling the method or method will commit all changes in the or . 如果其中一種方法呼叫之前呼叫方法時，不會認可變更時呼叫方法時，除非後進行進一步變更或呼叫。If either of these methods are called before the method is called, no changes will be committed when the method is called, unless further changes have been made since or was called. > [!NOTE] > 如果在更新的資料列時發生錯誤，擲回例外狀況，並執行更新已停用。If an error occurs while updating a row, an exception is thrown and execution of the update is discontinued. 若要繼續更新作業，而不會產生例外狀況，當發生錯誤時，設定屬性`true`之前先呼叫。To continue the update operation without generating exceptions when an error is encountered, set the property to `true` before calling . 您可能也會回應內的每個資料列基礎上的錯誤`RowUpdated`DataAdapter 的事件。You may also respond to errors on a per-row basis within the `RowUpdated` event of a DataAdapter. 若要繼續更新作業，而不會產生例外狀況中的`RowUpdated`設定事件，屬性至。To continue the update operation without generating an exception within the `RowUpdated` event, set the property of the to . > > 每個資料行，您將傳播到資料來源上，參數應該加入至`InsertCommand`， `UpdateCommand`，或`DeleteCommand`。For every column that you propagate to the data source on , a parameter should be added to the `InsertCommand`, `UpdateCommand`, or `DeleteCommand`. `SourceColumn`參數的屬性應該設定為資料行的名稱。The `SourceColumn` property of the parameter should be set to the name of the column. 此設定表示參數的值未以手動方式設定，但會從目前所處理的資料列中的特定資料行中取得。This setting indicates that the value of the parameter is not set manually, but is taken from the particular column in the currently processed row. ## Examples 下列範例會使用衍生的類別，至資料來源。The following example uses the derived class, , to the data source. span.span: The source table is invalid.

exception.span: 嘗試執行 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式會造成沒有資料錄受影響。

span.span: An attempt to execute an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement resulted in zero records affected.
